WorkItem.Description:
Have tried playing various video streams including mjpg, MP4 (streamed from the vrplayer.tv site) and youtube clips, none seem to initialize. All work fine on VRPlayer PC, VLC PC and VLC Android.

No problems with other video playback

Below links didn't work (other links were on private servers):
http://vrplayer.tv/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/Vortex_VR_3D.mp4
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yoF9vcFbo_4
WorkItem.Summary: VRPlayer Android: Video streams aren't working

Comments.Message:
Update: The above links will work if a phone has some sort of cellular connection but will not work with wifi only.

mjpg streams still do not function
Youtube url are not working for me on android VR player version. Do you write them in any particular way?
